ing: 1 Gala apple, peeled, cored and chopped
des: "Thick and healthy fruit drink with apple, banana and orange juice. The frozen banana takes the place of shaved ice and results in a smooth, creamy texture. Serve with dollop of whipped cream for added effect."
ins: In a blender combine frozen banana, orange juice, apple and milk. Blend until smooth. pour into glasses and serve.
